summary: In this context, Buta-1,3-diene and Butadiene refer to the same chemical compound, 1,3-butadiene, which is a volatile organic compound (VOC) monitored for air quality due to its toxicological significance. The discussion focuses on the monitoring and reduction of 1,3-butadiene concentrations in the Milby Park area, indicating a direct relationship between the two terms as they represent the same substance in environmental studies.
